title: Still waiting on the Skin for 10 year anniversary
body: Title says it all, was just wondering if they are still having problems

replies.body:
For the rare cases that we missed someone, we're taking care of on a case-by-case basis through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Go ahead and reach out there and we'll take care of you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Got it today, thanks for the help :)
